title: 19 Minor oddity T-206's for sale...Make offer for and or all !!!
author: Gradedcardman

posts.post_title: 19 Minor oddity T-206's for sale...Make offer for and or all !!!
posts.post_content:
For sale are 19 minor oddities and normal T-206's. Prices are somewhat negotiable if not to your liking. PM's received in order will have priority. Cards taken at listed price take priority over negotiable.

Thanks
